name: test_invalid_user_creds_for_registration
description:
Verify that a user cannot register using invalid credentials and
        appropriate validation error messages are displayed in the registration form.

steps.name: Open page: "https://guest:welcome2qauto@qauto2.forstudy.space/"
Click Sign in button in the header
Click on "('xpath', "//button[@class='btn btn-outline-white header_signin']")"
Click Registration button in "Log in" modal window
Click on "('xpath', "//button[@class='btn btn-link' and text()='Registration']")"
Fill in Registration form invalid creds
Fill in "Name" field by "йй" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupName')" by text: "йй"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupName')"
Fill in "Last_name" field by "йй" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupLastName')" by text: "йй"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupLastName')"
Fill in "Email" field by "йй" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupEmail')" by text: "йй"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupEmail')"
Fill in "Password" field by "йй" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupPassword')" by text: "йй"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupPassword')"
Fill in "Password" field by "йй" in "Registration" modal window
Fill in field "('css selector', '#signupRepeatPassword')" by text: "йй"
Find element: "('css selector', '#signupRepeatPassword')"
Find element: "('xpath', "//div[@class='modal-content']")"
Verify that registration form return 5 validation msgs
Wait until "5" elements are found by locator "('xpath', "//div[@class='invalid-feedback']")"

labels.name: story
labels.value: Registration a user with invalid creds
